Use this option if you want the attribute to suggest previously saved values as text. This option is only effective if the display height of the text entry is equal to 1.

If suggestion of existing values is enabled this option determines how returned values are sorted. Choosevalue to sort alphabetically. Choose most recently added to sort with most recently entered values first.
